name: The Rat's Ruffled Reliquary of Redemption
name_original: The Rat's Ruffled Reliquary of Redemption
description:
One rat's journey to redeem himself for hurting the feelings of a little girl, by returning the lace that he previously stole to make a nest.

Art assets created by special guest stars of two programmers and a monkey. Sadly, the monkey could not make it due to a prior engagement.
